name: fruitlessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being unsuccessful or producing nothing of value: They despaired at the fruitlessness of the meeting. She saw the fruitlessness of the situation. See
fruitless
More examplesFewer examplesThe failure of the war illustrates the fruitlessness of military might alone. I didn't want to point out to her the fruitlessness of her love. He is dispirited by the apparent fruitlessness of his efforts.
